scripts.dev: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run develop" "cd backend && npm run develop"
scripts.installall: concurrently "cd frontend && npm install" "cd backend && npm install"
scripts.rm:caches: concurrently "cd frontend && rimraf .next" "cd backend && rimraf .cache .tmp exports build"
scripts.rm:node_modules: concurrently "cd frontend && rimraf node_modules" "cd backend && rimraf node_modules" && rimraf node_modules
scripts.nuke: npm run rm:caches && npm run rm:node_modules
